overview: An average guy with an obsession for Chad Knight plays interactive Let's-Makes-A-Deal with a television devil (a very hot Kevin Kramer) and suddenly finds himself transformed into the porn world's newest star (Alec Powers). Director Kevin Aames's latest fantasy also stars sexy young discovery Ethan-Michael Ayers as the angel who battles for Biff Jones' soul.
tagline: Be Careful What You Wish For...
title: Hard Bargains
